title: How to listen to other people's conversations - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't. I'm far too polite to eavesdrop. I know a chronic eavesdrop. She is terrible at it. She thinks she's being covert, but everyone knows what she's up to. She’d make a terrible spy.

Years of stalking has taught me many efficient methods of listening in on others’ conversations. That being said, I think the best method is to place bugs and hidden cameras around their house and in their car.
